amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by 0.7 percent the total amount authorized to be appropriated for intelligence activities with the CIA Retirement and Disability Fund excepted from this reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the authorized funding provided in the bill by .7%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 238 (Roll no. 255).
